testcase.classname: User Registration and Shopping Cart Test
testcase.name: Register, Add Product to Cart, and Validate Payment
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the website homepage..........................................passed When I click on Sign in on the landing page and Register button.............passed And I create an account with a random email address and personal information.passed And I click on the Continue button..........................................passed Then I should see my correct name and surname displayed on the landing screen.passed When I add a product to the cart............................................passed And I proceed to the checkout page..........................................passed And I continue until the payment page.......................................passed Then I should see that the product details are correct on the payments page.passed
